remarks: Function-builder for derivative, addition rule.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvmptadd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptadd.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptadd.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvmptadd.da $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptadd.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> C e. CC ) $.
dvmptadd.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> D e. W ) $.
dvmptadd.dc $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> C ) ) = ( x e. X |-> D ) ) $.
dvmptadd $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> ( A + C ) ) ) = ( x e. X |-> ( B + D ) ) ) $.
$d S x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
